attributes.action: Government to take firmer action against threats from the Argentinian, and Spanish goverments regarding our overseas territories
attributes.additional_details:
Government to send a clear message to the Argentinian and Spanish governments that we will not tolerate,  unauthorized incursions into our territorial waters.

Government should lobby with more conviction in the EU with respect to over the top border checks by the Spanish authorities at Gibraltar.

The government should increase our military presence in both regions. Its time to take more of an interest in defending our own people, than operating in other far flung parts of the world!
